Content_wSideColumn.BodyCopy:
Photo: Skyview High School Nampa Idaho - 2007 by Idaho AirShips

Skyview High School

Nampa School District, Nampa Idaho

Principal: Kim Bekkedahl

Click here to visit school's website

Our Story

Skyview High School opened in 1996 as the second high school in our growing community. Our campus is located on Greenhurst Road between Sunnyridge Road and South Powerline Road.

Our instructional program focused on the needs of students.
A student's high school experience begins with small learning communities that create strong bonds among students and teachers and create a solid foundation for graduation and beyond.

Upper classmen select from a rich array of choices to help them realize their dreams for "Grade 13" or life beyond high school. Those choices include career-oriented academies, rigorous college-level courses, professional technical programs, general studies, and more. To learn more about our high school program click here.

Our high school offers competitive sports and fine arts programs.

Skyview is home to the district's health occupations academy as well as the building construction program. Our students also can choose the specialty programs available at our other two high schools and we regularly transport students to those sites so they can pursue these excellence programs.

 

Our students
Many factors influence school achievement, including how often a student attends school, moving frequently, and the English language experiences of the student. Measuring these characteristics helps us understand our students' needs.
South MS

1246 Total Enrollment 15002

5.30% Other 6.19%

 

Our Mission Statement
  • Relevant and Meaningful Education
  • Productive and Skilled Learners
  • We provide the foundation so that all students will develop a personal vision opening their own doors of opportunity for meaningful and productive lives.
